ED M 320.title: Elementary Mathematics Teaching Methods
ED M 320.prereq_description: Graduate standing and enrollment in The Teacher Education Program.
ED M 320.description: The application of research and theory to classroom practice in the teaching of mathematics.

ED M 321.title: Secondary Mathematics Methods
ED M 321.prereq_description: Graduate standing and enrollment in The Teacher Education Program.
ED M 321.description: Development of pedagogical content knowledge, methods, curriculum design, research, and theory related to teaching and learning Mathematics at the secondary level.

ED M 321M.title: Secondary Mathematics Methods
ED M 321M.prereq_description: Graduate standing and enrollment in The Teacher Education Program.
ED M 321M.description: Development of pedagogical content knowledge, methods, curriculum design, research, and theory related to teaching and learning Mathematics at the secondary level.

ED M 341.title: Student Teaching: Mathematics Secondary
ED M 341.prereq_description: Graduate standing and enrollment in The Teacher Education Program.
ED M 341.description: Supervised fieldwork in secondary Mathematics classrooms (grades 7-12).

ED M 371.title: Professional Issues in Teaching Mathematics: Secondary
ED M 371.prereq_description: Graduate standing and enrollment in The Teacher Education Program.
ED M 371.description: Seminar in which secondary teacher candidates in mathematics share and discuss their field experience, explore further avenues of teaching content, and investigate more effective ways of engaging and supporting students.
